- Are [93mall[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m [93mequally[0m [93mneurotoxic[0m? [93mInfluence[0m of [93msize[0m and [93msurface[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m on the [93mtoxicity[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m in [93mhuman[0m [93mneuronal[0m [93mcells[0m.: [93mNanoplastics[0m ([93mNPs[0m) are an [93memerging[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93minteractions[0m with the [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mevaluated[0m the [93mneurotoxic[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mfour[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m ([93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m): [93munmodified[0m ([93mplain[0m) [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m, and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m [93mfunctionalized[0m with [93mcarboxyl[0m ([93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m) or [93mamine[0m (A-[93mNPs[0m) [93mgroups[0m. [93mHuman[0m [93mSH[0m-[93mSY5Y[0m [93mneuroblastoma[0m [93mcells[0m were [93mexposed[0m to [93m1[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m for [93m24[0m or [93m48[0m [93mhours[0m. [93mDynamic[0m [93mlight[0m [93mscattering[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93maggregation[0m of [93mplain[0m [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m [93mNPs[0m in [93mwater[0m, while [93mpresence[0m of ≥[93m1[0m% [93mfetal[0m [93mbovine[0m [93mserum[0m [93mimproved[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m [93macross[0m [93mall[0m [93mparticle[0m [93mtypes[0m. [93mZeta[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mwater[0m were [93mapproximately[0m -[93m45[0m [93mmV[0m for [93mplain[0m and [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and -[93m30[0m [93mmV[0m for A-[93mNPs[0m.
